DDL.statement: ALTER TABLE `SYS_MODULES` CHANGE COLUMN `REPORT_FILENAME` `REPORT_FILENAME` VARCHAR(100) NULL DEFAULT NULL ;
UPDATE SYS_MODULES SET REPORT_FILENAME = 'Zebra_300dpi_Pack_Label_01.lbl' WHERE UPPER(REPORT_FILENAME) = UPPER('pack_label_01.lbl')
UPDATE SYS_MODULES SET REPORT_FILENAME = 'Zebra_300dpi_Pack_Label_02.lbl' WHERE UPPER(REPORT_FILENAME) = UPPER('Pack_Label_02.lbl')
UPDATE SYS_MODULES SET REPORT_FILENAME = 'Zebra_300dpi_Process_Order_Label_02.lbl' WHERE UPPER(REPORT_FILENAME) = UPPER('Process_Order.lbl')
UPDATE SYS_MODULES SET REPORT_FILENAME = 'Zebra_200dpi_QC_Sample_Label.lbl' WHERE UPPER(REPORT_FILENAME) = UPPER('Sample_Label_200dpi.lbl')
UPDATE SYS_MODULES SET REPORT_FILENAME = 'Zebra_300dpi_QC_Sample_Label.lbl' WHERE UPPER(REPORT_FILENAME) = UPPER('Sample_Label_300dpi.lbl')
UPDATE SYS_MODULES SET REPORT_FILENAME = 'Zebra_300dpi_Pallet_Label_A5_CDF_IJM.lbl' WHERE UPPER(REPORT_FILENAME) = UPPER('Zebra_A5_CDF_IJM.lbl')
UPDATE SYS_MODULES SET REPORT_FILENAME = 'Zebra_300dpi_Pallet_Label_A5_CDF_VAL.lbl' WHERE UPPER(REPORT_FILENAME) = UPPER('Zebra_A5_CDF_VAL.lbl')
UPDATE SYS_MODULES SET REPORT_FILENAME = 'Zebra_200dpi_Pallet_Label_A5_CDF_VAL.lbl' WHERE UPPER(REPORT_FILENAME) = UPPER('Zebra_A5_CDF_VAL_200dpi.lbl')
UPDATE SYS_MODULES SET REPORT_FILENAME = 'Zebra_300dpi_Pallet_Label_A5_NPP.lbl' WHERE UPPER(REPORT_FILENAME) = UPPER('Zebra_A5_NPP.lbl')
UPDATE SYS_MODULES SET REPORT_FILENAME = 'Zebra_300dpi_Pallet_Label_A5_Standard.lbl' WHERE UPPER(REPORT_FILENAME) = UPPER('Zebra_A5_Standard.lbl')
UPDATE SYS_MODULES SET REPORT_FILENAME = 'Zebra_300dpi_Process_Order_Label_01.lbl' WHERE UPPER(REPORT_FILENAME) = UPPER('Zebra_Process_Order.lbl')
UPDATE SYS_MODULES SET REPORT_FILENAME = 'Zebra_300dpi_Process_Order_Label_02.lbl' WHERE UPPER(REPORT_FILENAME) = UPPER('Process_Order_2.lbl')
ALTER TABLE SYS_PRINTERS ADD PRINTER_DPI VARCHAR(10)
